I'm great, thanks for asking! I'm in the mood for a great 80's horror film. My favorite horror film of all time is probably The Lost Boys (1987) . If you want to suggest something not from the 80's, that's okay, too. If you can think of something similar to that era, it's good.
A Nightmare on Elm Street (1984) is super good !
Yes! We loved that movie. It was scary back then, campy now. I've seen that recently. Can you think of another? We also loved Child's Play (1988) .
resp: Hahha exactly ! Still gives me shivers lol Have you seen The Fly (1986) ?!
